org.croudtrip.trips

Class TripsNavigationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.croudtrip.trips.TripsNavigationManager

  • public class TripsNavigationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all navigation / time of arrival tasks which are directly related to a TripOffer. Unlike DirectionsManager, this class is not responsible for any low level navigation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TripsNavigationManager(TspSolver tspSolver, JoinTripRequestDAO joinTripRequestDAO, DirectionsManager directionsManager) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NavigationResult getNavigationResultForOffer(TripOffer offer)
      Returns the NavigationResult for a given TripOffer with an optimal solution for visiting all the passengers

      Returns the NavigationResult for a given TripOffer with an optimal solution for visiting all the passengers
      java.util.List<UserWayPoint> getRouteWaypointsForOffer(TripOffer offer) 
      java.util.List<UserWayPoint> getRouteWaypointsForOffer(TripOffer offer, TripQuery query)
      Returns the complete route waypoints for a given TripOffer and one TripQuery including all passenger way points and their expected arrival time.

    • Method Detail

      • getRouteWaypointsForOffer

        public java.util.List<UserWayPoint> getRouteWaypointsForOffer(TripOffer offer)

      • getRouteWaypointsForOffer

        public java.util.List<UserWayPoint> getRouteWaypointsForOffer(TripOffer offer,
                                                     TripQuery query)
        Returns the complete route waypoints for a given TripOffer and one TripQuery including all passenger way points and their expected arrival time.
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer which includes the driver route and which is used to find the pending JoinTripRequest.
        query - an optional query which should also be considered during the matching process.

      • getNavigationResultForOffer

        public NavigationResult getNavigationResultForOffer(TripOffer offer)
                                             throws RouteNotFoundException
        Returns the NavigationResult for a given TripOffer with an optimal solution for visiting all the passengers
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer you want to do the navigation request for.
        Returns:
        the navigation result for this offer.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - If there exists no route for the driver.

      • getNavigationResultForOffer

        public NavigationResult getNavigationResultForOffer(TripOffer offer,
                                           TripQuery query)
                                             throws RouteNotFoundException
        Returns the NavigationResult for a given TripOffer with an optimal solution for visiting all the passengers
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer you want to do the navigation request for.
        query - an optional query which should also be considered during the matching process.
        Returns:
        the navigation result for this offer.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - If there exists no route for the driver.
